publicationStmt.authority: AHRC funded research project in Middle French 2004 to 2009 contact Charlie.Mansfield at ed.ac.uk

p.div1:
The page is unruled; it contains three devices, all associated with names and in different hands, and one ex-libris.
sur tous autres The device of Jacquette of Luxembourg, Duchess of Bedford.
Jaquete
Plus est en vousThe device of Louis de Bruges, seigneur de la Gruthuyse († 1492) Preceded and followed by a paraph.
gruthuse Preceded and followed by a paraph.
Duke of Newcastle
his booke 1676 The ex-libris is written on a rectangle of paper pasted on to the parchment, and spanning the width of the page.
M A decorative 'M' is centred above the device.
NULLE LA VAULT The device of Anthony Woodville, Second Earl Rivers.
ARIVIERES The names is centred below the device.
The page shows traces of ruling in plummet.
The page is ruled in plummet, probably with 39 lines. A 'X' can be seen in the top right-hand corner ogf the page.>
